<h3 id="X18249">X(18249) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd ZANIAH TO 4th CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (-a+b+c)*(2*a^3+5*(b+c)*a^2+2*(b+c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :
<br>
<b>X(18249) = 3*X(2)+X(12526) = X(8)+3*X(4512) = 3*X(210)+X(12711) = X(388)+3*X(3929) = 3*X(551)-X(12559) = X(958)-3*X(5325) = 5*X(1698)-X(4295) = 3*X(3679)+X(4294) = 3*X(3740)-X(18251) = 3*X(3828)-2*X(3841) = X(4314)-3*X(4512) = X(4326)+3*X(5686) = 3*X(5325)+X(5837) = 3*X(5657)+X(12705) = 3*X(10164)-X(12520)</b>
<p>X(18249) lies on these lines: {1,5273}, {2,3339}, {3,9948}, {4,9}, {8,4314}, {21,6737}, {55,6743}, {63,4298}, {72,13405}, {144,5290}, {188,12568}, {191,4292}, {210,12711}, {220,3997}, {236,12570}, {270,2328}, {329,3947}, {387,4356}, {388,3929}, {405,6738}, {518,12564}, {519,958}, {551,12559}, {758,942}, {936,10164}, {946,5791}, {950,3683}, {986,3008}, {997,8726}, {1001,6744}, {1046,3664}, {1212,3931}, {1329,3828}, {1376,12511}, {1698,4295}, {1788,7308}, {2325,3714}, {2886,12558}, {3219,12527}, {3305,8582}, {3452,3634}, {3626,5302}, {3636,5289}, {3647,15823}, {3679,4294}, {3686,3704}, {3740,18251}, {3812,6666}, {3817,5705}, {3876,6745}, {3911,12709}, {3927,5850}, {4047,5750}, {4208,4312}, {4297,9799}, {4326,4882}, {4357,10521}, {4640,12512}, {4656,5230}, {4662,15733}, {4847,5250}, {5044,6001}, {5129,5775}, {5220,12855}, {5249,11684}, {5261,6172}, {5692,13411}, {5744,8583}, {5785,7992}, {6700,10176}, {7028,12569}, {8580,9949}, {9708,11362}, {9858,10178}, {11529,16845}, {12446,18227}, {12544,18229}, {12560,18230}, {12567,18235}, {12607,15481}, {17646,18236}</p>
<p>
X(18249) = midpoint of X(8) and X(4314)<br>
X(18249) = complement of X(3671)<br>X(18249) = X(578) of 2nd Zaniah triangle<br>X(18249) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 12526, 3671), (8, 4512, 4314), (9, 10, 18250), (10, 5493, 2550), (960, 5745, 1125), (960, 18253, 5745), (4847, 5250, 12575), (5325, 5837, 958), (18228, 18231, 1698)<br></p>
